condition.description: The entity condition type to check for.
condition.markdownDescription: The entity condition type to check for.

bientity_condition.description: The bi-entity condition type to check for with the entity with this condition as the actor and the entities in the radius as the targets.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: The bi-entity condition type to check for with the entity with this condition as the actor and the entities in the radius as the targets.

radius.description: The radius to check the entities that fulfill the specified entity condition type within.
radius.markdownDescription: The radius to check the entities that fulfill the specified entity condition type within.

comparison.description: How the amount of entities within the specified radius which fulfills the specified entity/bi-entity condition type(s) should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the amount of entities within the specified radius which fulfills the specified entity/bi-entity condition type(s) should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the amount to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the amount to.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](../entity_condition_types.md).

Checks whether the player has a specified number of entities that match a specified entity condition in a specified radius. The radius originates at the center of the entity with this condition.

Type ID: `apugli:entity_in_radius`
